secText:
Lesson:
1. Describe what occurs to a sound when the source of the [OBJ:expsec_n266:sound moves toward a listener].
2. Describe what occurs to a [OBJ:expsec_n267:sound when the sound source moves away] from a listener.
3. [OBJ:expsec_n268:Calculate] what occurs when the sound source moves toward or away from the listener using Doppler effect equations.
4. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_banddoppler_question:calculate the sound frequency] of a moving source.
5. [OBJ:expsec_n269:Calculate] what occurs when the listener moves toward or away from the sound source using Doppler effect equations.
6. [OBJ:expsec_n270:Calculate] what occurs when both the listener and sound source are moving using Doppler effect equations.

In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_36180:Calculate] the sound frequency heard by someone listening to a sound source.
Quick Review: [OBJ:sum_doppler_concept:Doppler Effect], [OBJ:sum_doppler_object_moves:Doppler Equations: Source Moves], [OBJ:sum_listener_moves:Doppler Equations: Listener Moves]
